query: Picture 1: /home/z00533370/projects/datasets/LMUData/images/MMBench/401.jpg Hint: This time line shows important events during the California Gold Rush. Question: Based on the time line, which event happens after James Marshall discovers gold and before gold becomes harder to find? Options: A. Many people move to California. B. Silver is discovered in Nevada. Please select the correct answer from the options above.
